sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_cls_idea"> <x_snc_cls_idea action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>false</active> <description>How I had to fix the export of sys_attachment_doc by changing addEncodedQuery('sys_attachmentIN' + array) to addQuery('sys_attachment', 'IN', array)</description> <episode display_value="NOWCommunity Live Stream - 2019-06-14">dd8cd719db0637c0a8a2163705961901</episode> <name>addEncodedQuery() vs. addQuery()</name> <script/> <sys_created_by>chuck.tomasi</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-06-03 11:39:45</sys_created_on> <sys_id>83a09235db3dfb80a8a21637059619ab</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>chuck.tomasi</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-06-14 14:26:53</sys_updated_on> </x_snc_cls_idea> </record_update>
